content: twice then continue in stockinette stitch until work measures 3 3 75 4 5 inches from beginning proceed to instructions for decrease rounds decrease rounds note switch to dpns when necessary key round 1 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end of round  co cast on  k knit round 2 k all stitches  p purl round 3 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round  st s stitch es round 4 knit all stitches  rs right side round 5 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round  ws wrong side round 6 knit all stitches  k2tog knit 2 stitches together  bobble bind off round 7 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round  kwise knitwise round 8 knit all stitches  pwise purlwise round 9 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round  pm place marker round 10 k all stitches  sm slip marker  rm remove marker round 11 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round  dpns double point needles round 12 k all stitches rm  sl slip round 13 *k2tog repeat from * until 8 8 9 stitches remain on needles finishing cut yarn thread yarn onto darning needle and sew through each remaining loop kwise beginning with the next st draw tightly and push needle through to ws of beanie securely weave in all ends block lightly if desired wool benefits from a nice soak in a wool wash then find a cute baby who needs a beanie  pattern support |questions |comments ravelry dolevalleygirl & dolevalleygirlknits please contact me at happyindolevalley@gmail com instagram dolevalleygirl 1-2-3…baby beanie | ©2013 2016 2018 lisa seifert & dolevalleygirlknits | all rights reserved | for personal use only
